description:
If you want to save the world, destroy Tokyo!
Chihiro and his friends are bewildered by Dux`s unexpected words.
However, believing he`s destined to destroy everything he comes across,
Chihiro ignores the warnings of his friends and smashes his immense power against Tokyo!
While Chihiro and Yuri are battling, they`re confined within a mysterious extradimensional space.
Though they are enemies, Yuri makes a surprising suggestion...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nikurashii Teki ga Naze ni Shitawashii
Un ennemi aussi détestable que bien-aimé
Why Do I Love My Despised Enemy
憎らしい敵がなぜに慕わしい
